Title: Enacts the "opened physician entrance (OPEN) act"
Summary: Enacts the "opened physician entrance (OPEN) act"; requires every health care provider's office that provides outpatient services to install at least one automatic entry door; provides income tax credits for providers who install an automatic door if they did not previously have one.
LawCode: Amd §378, Exec L; amd §§606 & 210-B, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the tax law, in relation to enacting the "opened physician entrance (OPEN) act"
